meanings.definition: A structure in fungi that produces spores
meanings.sent1: The telia of the mushroom released tiny spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the telia under a microscope to observe the spore production.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled telia dust on the forest floor, causing mushrooms to grow everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The telia acted like a factory, churning out spores non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The telia resembled a tiny spore factory, working tirelessly to spread fungal seeds.
